content.rendered:
Keyboard shortcuts

Home
Review

excerpt.rendered: Keyboard shortcuts Ctrl-G When the Navigator is displayed, enter the passage to focus through the keyboard. Escape Cancel any navigation or style operation. Alt-Down Arrow Navigate to the next verse. Alt-Up Arrow Navigate to the previous verse. Ctrl-S Open the styles from the Bible editor. Ctrl/Cmd-F Find text. Cmd-G Find next. Ctrl/Cmd-P Print. Ctrl-\ Cycle… Read More »Help-keyboard shortcuts
